xdsAdTemplateClassCode.title: Class Code
xdsAdTemplateClassCode.description: Class Code in JSON format { "code" :"code", "displayName": "Display Name", "schemeName": "Schema"} - f.e. { "code" :"57016-8", "displayName": "Privacy Policy Acknowledgement","schemeName": "2.16.840.1.113883.6.1"}

xdsAdTemplateConfidentialityCode.title: Confidentiality Code
xdsAdTemplateConfidentialityCode.description: Confidentiality Code in JSON format { "code" :"code", "displayName": "Display Name", "schemeName": "Schema"} - f.e. { "code" :"N", "displayName": "Normal","schemeName": "2.16.840.1.113883.5.25"}

xdsAdTemplateContentTypeCode.title: Content Type Code
xdsAdTemplateContentTypeCode.description: Content Type Code in JSON format { "code" :"code", "displayName": "Display Name", "schemeName": "Schema"} - f.e. { "code" :"34746-8", "displayName": "Nursing Evaluation and Management Note","schemeName": "2.16.840.1.113883.6.1"}

xdsAdTemplateFormatCode.title: Format Code
xdsAdTemplateFormatCode.description: Format Code in JSON format { "code" :"code", "displayName": "Display Name", "schemeName": "Schema"} - f.e. { "code" :"urn:ihe:pcc:xphr:2007", "displayName": "Exchange of Personal Health Records","schemeName": "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.2.3"}

xdsAdTemplateHealthCareFacilityTypeCode.title: Health Care Facility Type Code
xdsAdTemplateHealthCareFacilityTypeCode.description: Health Care Facility Type Code in JSON format { "code" :"code", "displayName": "Display Name", "schemeName": "Schema"} - f.e. { "code" :"HOS", "displayName": "Hospital","schemeName": "2.16.840.1.113883.5.10588"}

xdsAdTemplatePracticeSettingCode.title: Practice Setting Code
xdsAdTemplatePracticeSettingCode.description: Practice Setting Code in JSON format { "code" :"code", "displayName": "Display Name", "schemeName": "Schema"} - f.e. { "code" :"45899008", "displayName": "Free-standing laboratory facility","schemeName": "2.16.840.1.113883.6.96"}

xdsAdTemplateTypeCode.title: Type Code
xdsAdTemplateTypeCode.description: Type Code in JSON format { "code" :"code", "displayName": "Display Name", "schemeName": "Schema"} - f.e. { "code" :"9611000146101", "displayName": "Video and audio (record artifact)","schemeName": "2.16.840.1.113883.6.96"}
